    pfs=""
>
[Alchemist's Fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 545 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Alchemist’s fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist’s fire deals the listed fire damage, persistent fire damage, and splash damage. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

level="2"

>
Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1d8 fire damage, 1 persistent fire damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

<title

pfs="Standard"
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

---

</row>
